import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { MatCardModule } from '@angular/material/card'; import { MatMenuModule } from '@angular/material/menu'; import { MatIconModule } from '@angular/material/icon'; import { MatFormFieldModule } from '@angular/material/form-field'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-details', standalone: true, imports: [ CommonModule, MatCardModule, MatMenuModule, MatIconModule, MatFormFieldModule, ], templateUrl: './user-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-details.component.css'], }) export class UserDetailsComponent {} User Details
First Name:
John

Doe

123456

New York, Broadway 123, Apt 4, 10001
